examples.example: 这位作家以其深刻的思想和精彩的文笔赢得了众多读者的喜爱。

translate.english: This writer has won the love of many readers with his profound thoughts and wonderful writing style.

examples.example: 那位作家凭借坚持不懈的努力和独特的创作风格在文学界大放异彩。

translate.english: That writer shines brightly in the literary world with persistent efforts and unique creative style.

examples.example: 这位作家通过细腻的情感描写和动人的故事架构，给读者们带来了无尽的感动。

translate.english: This writer has brought endless moving to the readers through delicate emotional description and touching story structure.
